message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this, but remember, next round you'll be in charge of the offer!
Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 65-35. This is my final offer before inflation kicks in again.
Come on, Alice, 55-45 is a fair deal considering the inflation. Let's end this.
